title: Was Snowflake’s IPO mispriced or just misunderstood?
author: Alex Wilhelm
content: Welcome back to The TechCrunch Exchange, a weekly startups-and-markets newsletter. It’s broadly based on the daily column that appears on Extra Crunch, but free, and made for your weekend reading.

title: From Unity to Disrupt, tech has an especially optimistic week
author: Eric Eldon
content: Snowflake, Jfrog, Sumo Logic and Unity each raised price ranges days before IPO, to meet what had seemed like growing enthusiasm from public markets. Each one still popped.
